thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Secure Trust Bank Sees FY Results In Line With Market Expectations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Secure Trust Bank Sees FY Results In Line With Market Expectations
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Arbuthnot Banking Group Plc:
* SECURE TRUST BANK PLC - TODAY ISSUES A PRE‐CLOSE TRADING UPDATE AHEAD OF ITS ANNUAL RESULTS ANNOUNCEMENT FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* SECURE TRUST BANK PLC - TRADING IN FINAL PERIOD OF YEAR HAS BEEN IN LINE WITH MANAGEMENT‘S EXPECTATIONS
* SECURE TRUST BANK PLC - FULL YEAR RESULTS ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN LINE WITH MARKET EXPECTATIONS
* SECURE TRUST BANK PLC - CUSTOMER NUMBERS AND ASSOCIATED RETAIL FINANCE, MOTOR FINANCE, MORTGAGES AND SME LENDING BALANCES HAVE CONTINUED TO GROW Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
